website_summaries.verdict: Good-looking photo album cover with a nice sentimental message.
pros: Large photo album that can hold two photos per page and 200 total 4 x 6-inch photos
Safe for all photos, as it doesn't contain damaging chemicals
Includes an area around the photos so you can write messages or include some scrapbooking-like artwork
cons: Album has an odd odor initially

customer_reviews.title: Great album, but falls short on picture count.
customer_reviews.text: Nice album, was pretty excited to start filling it. Unfortunately, I started noticing that it was getting filled faster than it should. After a count of pages, this album only holds 184 pictures, not 200. I know, it’s only 16 pictures, but when I had my designated pictures, I now have to start choosing ones to remove. Little disappointing. If you don’t need a full 200 pictures, this is a great album.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Leather Scrapbook!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great buy. It is made from genuine leather and it holds 200 4 by 6 pictures and also one picture in the middle on front of scrapbook. I highly recommend this on all levels the quality is incredible and will preserve your photos and great life moments in a beautiful handcrafted genuine leather scrapbook!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Glackin

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I filled this with family photos from the past 35 years and gave it to my daughter on her wedding day. Everyone in the brides suite was looking through it, and commenting on how quickly time passes. I especially liked the space in front where you could put a personalized photo. It is an excellent buy and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Barb J

customer_reviews.title: the pages/plastic pockets are so easily broken off
customer_reviews.text: Each page has a plastic pocket that is glued in the middle. The divider glue is very easily broken when inserting photos. The plastic photo pocket can easily break off. Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: ulam

customer_reviews.title: Great album
customer_reviews.text: Album was just what I wanted. It was in really good condition, and the cover has a nice feel to it. Pictures go in easily and I like being able to write notes. I no longer buy albums that do not have space for this, as we forget too easily these days when and where the photos were taken.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Lander

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of this album
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this album. What I really really really don't like about this album is the spot for the front "picture." Rather than put a picture I put a little note on a business card to decorate the front. The front has a little plastic sheet(?) that slides out and if you can touch it through the opening then it wrinkles making the pictures look funny. I like rest of the album. the look and feel, every thing is nice except that front opening.
customer_reviews.author: D.Stel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice photo album. I used it to put pictures of my son's wedding in. We had so many shots on our phones and on the camera memory card and computer, but it's nice to have actual pictures of the wedding and related activities. The little place to put a picture in front is nice, and I like the saying LIVE, LAUGH, LOVE on front. I gave them with wedding pictures in them to family members, and they liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this album!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this album to store our wedding pictures. It was the perfect size and quality for our informal and small wedding. It has a padded cover with wordings stitched with thread. It took me no time to slip in the pictures into the pockets. The pictures have stayed in place without issues. Each page has a memo space where you can add notes beside each of the pictures. Overall I am very happy with this purchase and definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marge0808

customer_reviews.title: I'd return this item if i didn't have to find a better shipping container (at no cost to me) than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made! Photo sleeves are not attached well and come off the page by merely inserting the picture. I'd return this item if i didn't have to find a better shipping container (at no cost to me) than the one it was shipped in
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Great Album! Great Price! Why not buy two?
customer_reviews.text: I loved this photo album, before I purchased it, and love it even more, now that I've purchased it. It's vegan leather, for those who are conscientious about animal rights. The words "Live, Laugh, Love" are stitched on, which adds a nice touch. It holds 200 pictures = 2 pictures a side, 4 pictures a sheet x 50 sheets. Inside, next to each photo folder, is a space to write a memo or caption of the photographs, if you so choose. I have been left with five boxes of family photographs, so I bought two, and some other photo albums. But these are the best deal for this price, and they happen to look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dove

customer_reviews.title: Have had it since 2012
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2012 and it is still in great shape. Only one page was ripped out by my 2 year old daughter, definitely not the photo album's fault! I love it so much I just bought 2 more so I can update our family pictures. Easy to store and fun to look at. I love the ability to write notes on the side, I have been putting dates or the name of the events we have gone to.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Probably going to last forever
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this album is great. Easy to slide the photos in. I like that it’s not flimsy and I know it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: It's almost like i wanted it. It's my fault though should of looked through my photos to see how many I had width than length for pictures . Other than that it's a GREAT album need to get more for the length pictures i have more of than width now. LOL :D
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bellemore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a birthday or anniversary, or even just a friendly gesture
customer_reviews.text: i honestly didn't know that this album was leatherette and not real leather. SUPER high quality and great embroidery quality too. The ability to add a note/memo to each horizontally placed sleeve is awesome. Holds up really well and no worries about the pages falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Well made photo album
customer_reviews.text: This album accommodated all my vacation photos I took in Florida with my family what I like best about it is that there’s room for special notation’s name date etc. I will in the future purchase more of these albums
customer_reviews.author: Allyoop 123

customer_reviews.title: Worth checking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice album. The space to write is a plus. Holds a bunch of pictures and I chose to add my first year with Bobby I came out cute. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Luciano O

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect album for memories. Small enough to store easily and the perfect size for the story of one's vacation or special event. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cardinale

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for Wedding album
customer_reviews.text: Love this album. Not real leather, so it does scratch, but it is of amazing quality. Makes my CVS printed wedding pictures look like a million bucks. Really great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ohemaa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. Some people complained about the photo album not having portrait slots. I think if you turn the photo album to the side then you get portrait so it’s all good for me. I reorganized photos a few times but I was doing it carefully and the photo pockets are still fine so I think they tear easily. Overall, it was worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mashi

customer_reviews.title: beautiful album
customer_reviews.text: This album is too cute... the print on the front cover is embroidered, looks so nice. Item is pretty from cover to cover. This is a gift, and I'll be happy to present it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kay

customer_reviews.title: Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: We got this Photo Album to put pictures of my cat of almost 16 years. I have a form of MD and have both my hips replaced and the right was redone twice Sneakes "my cat" was always by my side and my son took alot of pictures he a very special cat. I am still going through boxes of pictures so I have not yet started filling the album but I love the look of it. And I have those same words on my waw in my house.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice album
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as expected. Holds over 200 photos, all horizontally, with a column in the inside to write notes next to each picture. There is a spot on the cover for a pic as well. Embroidered on the front. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY IN A PHOTO ALBUM
customer_reviews.text: THIS ALBUM HOLDS AMPLE PICTURES THAT ARE QUITE EASILY PLACED. COVER IS MOST ATTRACTIVE, AND IT'S SIZE IS A POSITIVE: NOT TOO LARGE. GAD
customer_reviews.author: GERARD A. DUPUIS

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mom for her birthday with family pictures. She loves printed photos so she loved the gift. It's a sturdy album and looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought again
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these and was so impressed that I bought another one. Looks better than pictured. The Live, Laugh, Love is 3 dimensional due to it being stitched. Highly recommend and will buy again if I need another photo albumn or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Janice H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The front picture is smaller so i had to cut a picture smaller but this book is worth it, you can write little things on the side of the pictures if you like and theres so much space to put pictures
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Couple of the pages are torn. Also it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Couple of the pages are torn. Also it is very flemsey the paper is very thin so as the pages turn it will fall apart quickly.
customer_reviews.author: H. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I didn’t like is that it forces you to have photographs inserted a certain way. I couldn’t break apart the seam in the middle so I could insert pictures the long way. It rips a whole when tearing apart.
customer_reviews.author: Misty C Brown

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I haven't opened this photo album because it is a gift for a friend. However, the quality of the cover is better than I expected. The embroidered lettering is so nice! This is a well made, sturdy album that will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: amazing for price
customer_reviews.text: was a little concerned with previous reviews about pages falling out but honestly as long as you are careful wit pages.. which you should be in first place, then you should be fine. Other than that, great item for great price.
customer_reviews.author: DEE

customer_reviews.title: Modern photo album
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent sized photo album for 4 x 6 photos. This photo album has a nice modern design. I found it easy to place my prints in the album. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Shopper1412

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice photo book. Has a place to write next to each picture.
customer_reviews.author: iowa829

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality
customer_reviews.text: The design is good, but quality is not very good. It teared when we were trying to put photos in. Ok for this price I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Customizable with consistency
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can customize the album with a photo on the front. The Pioneer Photo Album gives me consistency with the ability to tell albums apart. I also like that there is a specific place to write notes for each of the photos. The albums have a nice warm look to them and are perfect for leaving out for others to see but compact enough to easily shelve.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Lookin’ Good
customer_reviews.text: Use the album to put my daughters wedding pictures ~ good looking, holds plenty of pictures & easy to fill...
customer_reviews.author: AgateVicki

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Made a family keepsake using this photo album. Great quility and great but
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: Photo album
customer_reviews.text: Great album, easy to put in and take pictures out. The only minor problem I have is the picture I put in front of the album keeps moving from side to side. This album holds a lot of pictuers. It's not big and bulky and not too small. It's light and compact to carry around if you want to show off your pictures. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed while l was placing the photos in the album
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed while l was placing the photos in the album, the separaters in between the photos were not there, and the plastic sleeves were coming out of the book .
customer_reviews.author: Maxine oakley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice album. Holds 200 4X6 photos
customer_reviews.text: Very nice album. Holds 200 4X6 photos . Nice margin to write in as well. I would def buy this again. update - I did buy another one and it was great too !!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time. Well made. Like that the photo takes center stage, but still can journal on the side. Only one page had a loose sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: MarMar

customer_reviews.title: I liked them!
customer_reviews.text: No issues upon arrival, no damage. I loaded in vacation pictures without any problem, is sturdy enough but I don't have a bunch of kids ripping at the books to look at them either. I would purchase more without a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Lamb

customer_reviews.title: How nice photo album this is .
customer_reviews.text: The album is one of the best I own and keep my loving pictures of long ago and grandma pictures. safe keeping.
customer_reviews.author: new rug

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking, High Quality Album
customer_reviews.text: I love Pioneer albums. They are excellent in quality as well as design. Beautiful, high quality products make it easy to organize my pictures with satisfaction. Everything about this album is fantastic right down to every detail. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: goddessofthehunt

customer_reviews.title: it looks like real leather
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and was pleasantly surprised . the album is made very well. also, it looks like real leather. very beautiful.thank you
customer_reviews.author: Cathy I.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what I was looking for! Photo albums are scarce these days. Thank you for continuing to carry them. I love flipping through the pages, remembering when these photos were taken. Great quality product, too!
customer_reviews.author: nashsplash

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Got it to put my best friends and I photos in there for Christmas. it is perfect !!! She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Leather got a little scoffed in delivery. But very nice. Emboridory is very pretty. But however the album itself is quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Lesia Marie Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this album for my Aunt and filled it with family pictures. Very nice album.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Unable to fit pictures vertically
customer_reviews.text: Unable to fit pictures vertically, I didn't think about this until I went to fill it. So if you have some pictures you want to put in an album that way, be advised you have to turn the album or your head sideways. If I would have known I would have bought a different one. The quality seems good, it is nice.
customer_reviews.author: T dub

customer_reviews.title: I am not very happy with it but I did not have time to ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of where I put the pictures do not fit the 4x6. Some of the pictures fall out because I had to break the seal. I am not very happy with it but I did not have time to buy another. It is a beautiful leather case, which is why I gave it 2 stars, but it looks bad that the pictures fall out or down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was one of the better photo albums we have ordered on line
customer_reviews.text: This photo album has a very sturdy leather bound casing, the pages are well constructed and include space to write a memo for each photo.The pictures slide easily into the pockets too. It was a great album for a very reasonable price. We would definitely consider purchasing another one like it the next time we need to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: RSSSWIS

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Fantastic Price
customer_reviews.text: This made a great Christmas gift to members of our family. We filled it with pictures of our "year in review". I was pleasantly surprised for the price, how durable and well-built these albums are. For something of this quality, I would have expected to pay more. This album holds 200 4X6 landscape prints, and the front cover holds a portrait print. I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: BSV

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my mom for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My mom is always complaining she needs more photo albums for all her pictures so I ordered a few of these and they are nice, the stitching is clean and they hold a lot of photos. She was thrilled not just to have them but because they are nice enough to leave out or to show. Very happy with price and product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for photo organization.
customer_reviews.text: Organized my photos and these are just wonderful. Very good quality and easy to use. I bought several so they look really nice in a bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good price. Only 4 stars because I thought it was a typical photo album where the clear plastic is all one piece but each page has 2 separate slots so you have to slide the pics. in one way only. You can arrange anyway you wish to. Kind of sux because all of the pics I have are now in there sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Mangler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect book
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make an album for gf and she loved it

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: When I was considering buying this Photo album I thought it was simple, but is not simple at all, it is nice looking and the quality can be seen on the cover, I like how you can write in front of each photograph
customer_reviews.author: SH J.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Have this above my fireplace full of pics, people that come over love to look at it. Some of the pages are starting to come apart, but other than that it looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten F.

customer_reviews.title: Great size and lots of room for photos!
customer_reviews.text: A great choice for a photo album full of wedding pictures! Such a good album for relatives' gifts!

customer_reviews.title: I really like these albums - easy to insert pics and has ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these albums - easy to insert pics and has an area next to each picture to write in notes. Great album!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. Area for making notes about the photos.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful album.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, looks exactly like the picture. I bought it for a gift for someone else and now I am going to order one :)

customer_reviews.title: Photos slip out of the pockets.
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered many photos and was looking forward to filling this new photo book. Unfortunately, as soon as I started putting the photos in to the slots, they slipped right back out. I have decided to throw this album away. I'm very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Dian R. Shaul

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high quality photo album
customer_reviews.text: This photo album is VERY good guality. I used it for my engagement pictures and had it displayed at the wedding, and I got a ton of compliments. The pages are easy to slide the pictures into and the cover is a beautiful material that feels like leather.
customer_reviews.author: KHWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my MIL. It's exactly as pictured. Good product. Good price.

customer_reviews.title: Such wonderful quality, I purchased 3 more for Christmas presents
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Bought one foe a birthday gift for my mother in law. Such wonderful quality, I purchased 3 more for Christmas presents. The Embroidery on the front of the album, gives it that classy touch. Can’t go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. My photos fit perfectly and are now well organized.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, especially for the money. I hope they are never discontinued. I will order again and again.

customer_reviews.title: Cute photo album
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this as a gift for me and it’s perfect for a small album.

customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Will purchase again. Arrived in excellent condition and on time.

product_meta.title: Pioneer Photo Albums Embroidered Live, Laugh, Love Black Sewn Leatherette Frame Cover Album for 4"x6" Prints
product_meta.description: Size:1This black leatherette cover album features a frame front accented with an embroidered "Live, Laugh, Love" sentiment. The album holds 200 photos in optically clear pockets with black mesh backgrounds that include memo writing areas. Photos are displayed two per page. The album is book bound with a deluxe rounded spine and measures 8.75"x9.25"x2". Photo Safe: Acid, lignin, and PVC free.
feature_bullets: Photo Safe: Acid, lignin, and PVC free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,319 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
